ai-patthana24.22:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana24.22:1.1_0: Not seeing should be given up for refuge.
ai-patthana24.22:2.1_0: Nor should be given up and relying on irrationally.
ai-patthana24.22:3.1_0: It doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”
ai-patthana24.22:4.1_0: (All should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana24.22:5.1_0: It’s not the reason for your refuge to the teaching ...
ai-patthana24.22:6.1_0: It’s not the reason for your refuge to the teaching, the support, and the training that isn’t the same.
ai-patthana24.22:7.1_0: That is the cause, based on unity, based on one end, the other spiritual path ...
ai-patthana24.22:8.1_0: It’s not the case that someone with death is guarded, perishing, and chase after listening to the teaching.
ai-patthana24.22:8.1_1: a cause and condition for rebirth ...
ai-patthana24.22:8.1_2: is a cause and condition for conditions ...
ai-patthana24.22:9.1_0: It’s not because of the scope of one basis, not for the sake of ending.
ai-patthana24.22:12.1_0: (This should be expanded in detail as in the chapter.)
ai-patthana24.22:13.1_0: It’s not the supreme cause or condition for the supreme conditions that give rise to confidence.
ai-patthana24.22:14.1_0: There is no such thing as the supreme refuge, but not the supreme sanctuary.
ai-patthana24.22:15.1_0: It’s not the case for someone with supreme guide for those who wish to train ...
ai-patthana24.22:15.1_1: if he is a reason for permission to be born.
ai-patthana24.22:16.1_0: It’s not the supreme guide for those who wish to train to listen to the Teaching.
ai-patthana24.22:16.1_2: Suppose there were no one sitting continuous flower. ...
ai-patthana24.22:18.1_0: (This is a condition for the sake of what is known as in brief.)
ai-patthana24.22:19.1_0: (This should be expanded in detail as in the chapter.)
ai-patthana24.22:20.1_0: Just as a hair blanket springs up?
ai-patthana24.22:21.1_0: The eighth sub-chapter on accepting of the teaching is finished.
ai-patthana24.22:22.1_0: The instruction to the important principles is finished.
ai-patthana24.22:23.1_0: The chapter on offenses entailing acknowledgment is finished.
